title: The weighted longitudinal profile (WLP) technical specification and experiences of Austria and Germany

author: Roland Spielhofer, Arsenal Research
Andreas Ueckermann, Arsenal Research
Eckhard Kempkens, Federal Highway Research Institute

segmentation: Thank you very much.
My name is Eckhart Kempkens.
I'm research India or at the Federal Highway Research Institute, Germany.
So.
Experiences from Germany Rd.
Monitoring and assessment of Federal Rd Network is carried out in Germany on motorways and federal trunk roads in the cycle of four years.
Up to now, the power spectral density PPSD has been used in the form of a German specification called Aon as an indicator regarding the characterization of evenness of pavement surface is experience.
This is have distinctly shown that the sensitivity of this indicator regarding impulsive and vafi forms of unevenness is not sufficient for Rd maintenance and pavement management system purposes.
The WRP method is able to level out this loss.
Consequently, net wide statistical analysis were realized based on the condition data of motivation, federal trunk roads data from 2001 to 2004.

Close attention was paid to the results of the WFP method concerning plausable characterization of the level of even evenness and accurate evaluation of the concrete curses in comparison to the UN index.
The next transparency shows the cumulative frequency diagram of a ON of German motorway.
Network the bar below.
Visualizes the proportion of blue, green, yellow and red condition of the network.

This transparency indicates improved sensitivity relating to the maintenance practice by applying WOP by rising the cumulative curve at the lower percentages and confirms the additional consideration of single obstacles caused by slab jacking.
An older and defect surface is.
An increase of the deck.
The damages is observable.
Impulsive, invasive forms has have been considered with him.
The evaluation now.
Proposals for a mathematical consideration of Delta WOP and zygma, WLP within the PM S have already been formulated.
Next, transparency demonstrates the well balanced sensitivity of the method by combining the.
Delta, WFP, and Sigma WRP.
Information via condition classes.
Application for the acceptance tests of construction work.
Central factors for the long term and evenness of indices for acceptance tests are.
Practical recognition of location are single obstacles such as steps, beats, waves, etc displayed at the exact location.
Accurate quantitative characterization of different uneveness forms.
Direct reading of the general level of unevenness.
Direct reading of Heights of different uneveness forms.
Furthermore, the WFP method is capable to cover unevenness forms with longer waves in comparison to simple procedures as straight edge or rolling strategy.
Further, the size of factor is the precision in terms of repeatability and reproducibility.
Comprehensive verifications were conducted.
Extensive statistical analysis and additional consideration of individual cases in C2 under practical conditions were carried out.
The results impress an application for acceptance tests.
Consequently, the WRP method was agreed as a basis for acceptance and expiry of guarantee tests for the for individual construction projects.
Considering 6 measurement devices.
35 test analyzes, sections, and motivation filled triangles.
The following table shows the evaluation of the WAP and Test state.
The presentation of the data of the acceptance for acceptance tests was improved by the hints of practitioners of the road.
Maintenance administrates.
A presentation with two graphs comprising long 2 new profile.
And why is it long?
It's not profile.
Has been established.
The possibility of direct reading of Heights.
And setting specific section markings was considered to be helpful to improve the handling.
A concluding investigation will provide fine tuning of the methods.
The experiences of the individual construction projects.
Impress a general application of this method in Germany.
It is a great leap in terms of simplification and completion of the acceptance tests in Germany.
Thank you very much.
